Package dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.server.service

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.server.service.GameService
@Service public class GameService extends Object
Service class for managing game-related operations. This class provides methods to create games, retrieve game information, update player cards, and add players to games.
Author:
Marcus Jagd Hansen, s214962

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the game to retrieve.
      Returns:

    • getPlayerCards

      public Optional<List<String>> getPlayerCards(Long gameId, Long playerId)
      Retrieves the cards of a player in a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      playerId - The ID of the player.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing a list of card names if found, or empty if not found.

    • updatePlayerCards

      public Optional<Player> updatePlayerCards(Long gameId, Long playerId, List<String> newCards)
      Updates the cards of a player in a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      playerId - The ID of the player.
      newCards - A list of new cards to assign to the player.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the updated Player if successful, or empty if not found.

    • addPlayerWithDefaultCards

      public Player addPlayerWithDefaultCards(Long gameId, String playerName)
      Adds a player with default cards to a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      playerName - The name of the player to add.
      Returns:
      The added Player object.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the player is not saved properly.
